Title: Guntur police ban entry into unauthorised ghats
Content: : Taken aback by the death of five students by drowning in the River Krishna on Tuesday, the Guntur police have declared all unauthorised ghats out of bounds for people.The five students, from Nandiga
Author: Staff Reporter
